meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7766.

td.p: Gary Waters, a college math teacher from Toronto, Ontario, Canada
Kate Fink, a journalism professor from New York, New York
Josh Hill, a network engineer from North Little Rock, Arkansas (whose 3-day cash winnings total $82,886)

tr.td: JEFF BRIDGES
THE AMERICAN REVOLUTION
THE 2017 IG NOBEL PRIZES
HOMOPHONIC PAIRS
BIBLE STUDY
CRIME SCENES IN CLUE
